name: @stackoverflow/stacks
description: Stack Overflowâ€™s CSS and Design Pattern Library. Stacks is an atomic CSS library with classes and components for rapidly building Stack Overflow.

scripts.init-docs: npm run update-icons && cd docs/ && gem install jekyll bundler && bundle install
scripts.start: cd docs/ && concurrently "webpack --watch" "bundle exec jekyll serve"
scripts.build-docs: cd docs/ && webpack -p && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx rm -rf docs/assets/dist && shx rm -rf docs/_site
